metaTags.metaTitle: Magic Transit | DDoS Protection for Networks
metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare named a "Leader" in the Forrester Wave for DDoS Mitigation. Protect your networks and data centers against DDoS attacks with Magic Transit.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

promotionalBanner.desktopText: The latest DDoS Threat Landscape report is out. Learn about the latest threats, trends, and how to defend against DDoS attacks.

relatedBlades.title: Magic Transit
relatedBlades.subtitle: Extending Cloudflare to all your networks
relatedBlades.copy:
When organizations need to protect their networks, IT departments typically turn to legacy hardware boxes or cloud 'scrubbing' providers. But traditional solutions just aren't designed to fulfill the Internet's basic needs: security, performance, and reliability.

Magic Transit is a network security solution that offers DDoS protection, traffic acceleration, and much more from every Cloudflare data center— for on-premise, cloud-hosted, and hybrid networks.

relatedBlades.quote: "Cloudflare has reliable infrastructure and an extremely competent and responsive team. They are well-positioned to deflect even the largest of attacks."

quoteCarousel.quote: "Thomson Reuters operates on-premise and cloud networks around the world. I'm excited about Cloudflare Magic Transit — the potential to unify our IP transit, DDoS mitigation, and traffic steering solutions into something we can manage with a single pane of glass will be game-changing. Cloudflare continues to impress me with its network's scale, in terms of geography, capacity, and product breadth."

"As the lines between corporate infrastructure and cloud services continue to converge, Cloudflare's modern approach to protecting infrastructure is a much-needed solution for the industry. The ability for Magic Transit to leverage the power and scale of cloud services to protect infrastructure, while maintaining per IP configuration and optionality, all while routing traffic performantly across Cloudflare's global network, makes it a no-brainer."

features.title: Move your network perimeter hardware to the cloud
features.description: Provision virtual network services on the fly: DDoS protection with over %{NetworkCapacity} of network capacity and near-instant mitigation, next-gen firewall, traffic acceleration, and much more.

features.title: Connect to the Cloudflare global network
features.description: Our security, performance, and reliability functions are [delivered from a physical presence](https://www.cloudflare.com/network/) in %{DataCenterCount} cities across over %{CountryCount} countries. This means threats are mitigated close to where they originate, not in your data center.

features.title: Drive down your Total Cost of Ownership (TCO)
features.description: Get operational agility with reduced capital expenditure. Replace on-premise hardware with network functions delivered and billed as a service.

relatedBlades.title: The next step in infrastructure architecture
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare Magic Transit protects entire IP subnets from DDoS attacks, while also accelerating network traffic. It uses Cloudflare's global network to mitigate attacks, employing standards-based networking protocols, like [BGP](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/security/glossary/what-is-bgp/), [GRE](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/network-layer/what-is-gre-tunneling/), and [IPsec](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/network-layer/what-is-ipsec/), for routing and encapsulation.

All your network assets, whether on-premise or in private or public hosted cloud environments are safeguarded.

image.description: Diagram of Cloudflare Magic Transit preventing a DDoS attack

contentfulAsset.description: Diagram of Cloudflare Magic Transit preventing a DDoS attack

features.title: Connect
features.description: Using Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) route announcements to the Internet, and Cloudflare's anycast network, customer traffic is ingested at a Cloudflare data center closest to the source.

features.title: Protect and Process
features.description: All customer traffic is inspected for attacks. Advanced and automated mitigation techniques can be applied immediately upon detecting an attack. Additional functions such as, load balancing, next-gen firewall, content caching and serverless compute are also delivered as a service.

features.title: Accelerate
features.description: Clean traffic is routed over Cloudflare's network for optimal latency and throughput and can be handed-off over GRE tunnels, private network interconnects ([PNI](https://www.cloudflare.com/network-interconnect/)) or other forms of peering to the customer network.

relatedBlades.title: The Cloudflare global network
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare delivers DDoS mitigation using our entire network. This network has a capacity of over %{NetworkCapacity} and spans more than %{DataCenterCount} cities in %{CountryCount} countries. Our network allows us to sit approximately %{OperationMilliseconds} ms from about 95% of the Internet-connected population globally. This is especially important for latency-sensitive applications such as Voice over IP (VoIP) and custom gaming protocols.

contentfulAsset.description: Global map of Cloudflare Network Interconnect locations

relatedBlades.title: Ultra-low Time to Mitigate (TTM)
relatedBlades.copy: With a heritage in DDoS mitigation and a vast library of known attacks, malicious traffic is identified at a Cloudflare data center closest to the source within seconds. Automatic mitigation techniques are applied immediately and most malicious traffic is blocked in __less than 3 seconds__.

imageAssetFile.altText: Reliability time to mitigate spot illustration 3
imageAssetFile.title: Reliability time to mitigate spot illustration 3

contentfulAsset.description: Reliability time to mitigate spot illustration

relatedBlades.title: Pick your network function
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare Magic Transit comes integrated with our best-in-class network firewall, allowing you to configure granular allow/deny rules for IP ranges and propagate changes in seconds. Want application level [firewalling](https://www.cloudflare.com/waf/)? Configure optional TLS termination and start inspecting payloads. Want a [load balancer](https://www.cloudflare.com/load-balancing/)? You got it. Want to write a serverless [Cloudflare Worker](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/cloudflare-workers/) to modify traffic on the fly? You can do that, too. 

Magic Transit comes natively integrated with all of Cloudflare's L4 and L7 products.

relatedBlades.title: Traffic acceleration
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare's network serves %{HTTPRequests} million HTTP requests per second on average. With every bit we move, the network gets smarter and faster. 

When integrated with [Argo Smart Routing](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/argo-smart-routing), Cloudflare Magic Transit will deliver clean traffic back to your network using the fastest, most reliable links in real-time.

relatedBlades.title: Key Features
keyFeature: Mitigate most attacks in under 3 seconds
Integrate via BGP routing and GRE encapsulation
Native integration with L7 services (CDN, WAF, Bot Management, etc.)
Support for all IP services (TCP, UDP, IPSec, VoIP, custom protocols)

relatedBlades.title: Forrester named Cloudflare a "Leader" in DDoS mitigation
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare has been recognized as a Leader in the 2021 Forrester Wave™: DDoS Mitigation Solutions. Cloudflare achieved the highest scores across fifteen evaluation criteria, including:

- Product vision
- Performance
- Speed of implementation
- Response automation
- Security operations centers

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare network services
relatedBlades.copy: Magic Transit is just one part of the Cloudflare network security and solutions family. Cloudflare offers built-in services — like DDoS mitigation, branch connectivity, software-defined Zero-Trust functionality, and network firewalling — on a single global network that replaces patchwork appliances. Connect, secure, and accelerate your corporate network with Cloudflare.

resourceList.title: Magic Transit DDoS Infographic - Resource Card
resourceList.resourceTitle: Five questions to ask your DDoS mitigation provider
resourceList.description: Selecting the right DDoS mitigation service is essential to protect your networks, applications, and users. Here are five questions to consider when evaluating providers.

resourceList.title: Network services video demo resource card
resourceList.description: This video demo shows how to use Cloudflare's Magic Transit, Magic WAN, and Magic Firewall to stop DDoS attacks, establish security rules, and simplify connectivity between complex global networks.

resourceMedia.description:
In this paper, we present results of Catchpoint tests we've run over our network to quantify the impact of latency with Magic Transit. These test results demonstrate that network performance (latency and packet loss) improved for the test customer when traffic was routed over Cloudflare
Magic Transit. Specifically, we observed in our test results that the latency decreased by 3 ms and packet loss was nearly zero when traffic was routed over Magic Transit.

resourceList.title: Magic Transit Performance Paper
resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare Magic Transit protects networks while improving performance
resourceList.description: In this paper, we present results of Catchpoint tests we've run over our network to quantify the impact of latency with Magic Transit. These test results demonstrate that network performance improved for the test customer when traffic was routed over Cloudflare Magic Transit.
